author: terence0083
content: <@845691100072509460> for `NewPayloadV5(params engine.ExecutableData, versionedHashes []common.Hash, beaconRoot *common.Hash, executionRequests []hexutil.Bytes, inclusionList *engine.InclusionListV1) `... can we replace `*engine.InclusionListV1` with `[][]byte`

author: terence0083
content: It makes the caller's job easier since I don't have to replace geth mod with your branch to get the type, and that's one of my last blockers for getting a local devnet ready.

author: jih2nn
content: Sounds good! Let me change the execution api PR accordingly.

author: jih2nn
content: Do you also prefer to change the return of `engine_getInclusionListV1` to `[][]byte`?

author: jih2nn
content: Updated. Removed using structures in other spots as well to avoid dependency.

author: jih2nn
content: I meant execution api but I also updated and rebased the geth PR.
